Package ch.juventus.yatzi.ui.interfaces

Interface ViewController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ViewHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardController, MainController, SetupController, StatusController
    public interface ViewController
extends javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The View Controller Interface is used to force all Controllers to implement needed methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void afterInit​(ViewContext context)
      This method runs all initializations, which depends on an present loaded view layout.

      • Methods inherited from interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

        initialize

    • Method Detail

      • afterInit

        void afterInit​(ViewContext context)
        This method runs all initializations, which depends on an present loaded view layout.
        Parameters:
        context - The function of the main controller
